  • Method Details

    • onActionAddAsPart

      void onActionAddAsPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Adds associated part to product upon pressing button. User selects a part from top menu to bottom menu.
      LOGICAL ERROR: In order to prevent duplicate parts from being added to the list, the conditional statement on line 73 was added to check for existing associated parts
      Parameters:
      event -

    • onActionCancelAddedProduct

      void onActionCancelAddedProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Redirects user to main menu upon pressing cancel button
      Parameters:
      event -
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionRemovePart

      void onActionRemovePart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Removes selected associated part from the table upon pressing remove button
      RUNTIME ERROR: The method would execute when selectedPart was null (the user didn't select an item). This was solved by adding a conditional statement to check if selectedPart is null. If it is null, an error message is displayed, and the program returns.
      Parameters:
      event -

    • onActionSaveAddedProduct

      void onActionSaveAddedProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Saves added product to inventory
      LOGICAL ERROR: In order to prevent incorrect input, conditional statements are used as filters. Inventory has to be in between Min and Max. Max cannot be less than Min, invalid input: '&' vice versa.
      Parameters:
      event -
      Throws:
      IOException

    • generateAlert

      public void generateAlert(String field)
      Creates a custom alert for the errors in the on action save method
      Parameters:
      field -

    • onActionAPSearch

      void onActionAPSearch(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Searches for parts in the part table view
      RUNTIME ERROR: The program would crash if invalid input was put into the search field. This was avoided by adding a conditional statement on line 184 that checks if the matching part list is empty. If it is empty, then an error message appears.
      Parameters:
      event -
